title: UI Alignment Issue on Profile Page
description: The profile picture appears misaligned on smaller screen sizes.

title: Spelling Mistake in Error Message
description: There is a typographical error in the error message displayed during login.

title: Inactive Button on Settings Page
description: The 'Save Changes' button remains inactive even after making modifications in the settings.

title: Incorrect Tooltip Displayed on Hover
description: The tooltip displayed on hovering over an icon does not match its functionality.

title: Broken Link in Help Section
description: One of the links in the help section redirects to a non-existent page.

title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Vulnerability in Forum
description: An attacker can inject malicious scripts into the forum pages, leading to potential data theft or manipulation of user sessions.

title: Buffer Overflow in Network Service
description: This bug enables attackers to overwrite adjacent memory locations, potentially leading to system crashes or remote code execution.

title: SQL Injection Vulnerability in E-commerce Platform
description: Attackers can manipulate SQL queries to access, modify, or delete sensitive data stored in the database, compromising user privacy and integrity.

title: Denial-of-Service (DoS) Vulnerability in DNS Server
description: This bug allows attackers to flood the DNS server with requests, rendering it unable to respond to legitimate queries and disrupting network services.

title: Privilege Escalation Vulnerability in Operating System
description: An attacker with limited access can exploit this bug to gain elevated privileges, potentially gaining full control over the system.
